(0)-w√§hlen/secrets/note-in-book.html.title: Note in Book
(0)-w√§hlen/secrets/note-in-book.html.description: Your acquaintances, Legion Since you‚Äôve been so kind to us, we‚Äôll tell you what that blade was. We‚Äôll even throw in a couple hints as a treat. That blade was stolen from Terrada, King of the Yokai. It is a shard of him. But we are happy you have it now. If you want to know more, help Wyvern in his quest. Also, when you see The Whirlwind calling to you, go into it. This will give you more than enough information for now.

(0)-w√§hlen/awakening-info.html.title: Awakening Info
(0)-w√§hlen/awakening-info.html.description:
The Whistling MountainsW√§hlen awoke in the whistling mountains, only their book keeping them company. However, a large humanoid creature met with W√§hlen, claiming to be an Oni and ordered W√§hlen off of the mountain. This contradicts public information as Oni are supposed to be extinct. 
The Ikcho Crafters
In the book, there was a name given to an Ikcho crafter W√§hlen was supposed to meet with by the name of Akenai Sachio.

(1)-party/dead/ceol.html.title: Ceol
(1)-party/dead/ceol.html.description:
Player: Ceol (he/him?)Infobox
As the guardian walked out of the Taor ruin, the guardian's eyes stopped on Ceolüî• and seemed to break free for just a moment, begging them to leave. Ceolüî• then spoke to it in Dwarvish as he theorized it was a Dwarf based on its stature. It was able to have a few more moments of clarity, begging them to leave and saying he couldn‚Äôt stop, all words spoken in Dwarvish. It continued to follow them, though now at a much slower pace.

(1)-party/hera.html.title: Hera
(1)-party/hera.html.description:
Player: Alli (she/her)Infobox
Paragus Kou has once again hired Heraüëø to escort the Kou family to a village known as Tansho. Kou has given little information as to why. As they arrived in Tansho, Hera was warned by a benevolent monstrosity, a Shokari, that Tansho spelled danger. Sure enough, a Vey‚Äôlflood had consumed the town and Paragus ordered her to go to Ninnan gate. One of the Shokari gave her a mount to travel with, allowing her to travel at a faster pace and meet with the party. After the events of Ninnan gate, Hera found herself captured with someone asking her questions which she did not cooperate with them. She then awoke to nearly being killed when Serai saved her. After meeting up with Paragus and his son, they found a samurai who just about killed Yari. Paragus, Barolt, and Serai stayed behind to buy time for Hera to escape the samurai. The last thing she told her was to meet Serai at their family home.

(1)-party/praxis.html.title: Praxis
(1)-party/praxis.html.description:
Player: Rowan (they/them/he/him)Infobox
Short black Tabaxi with sharp yellow eyes, frazzled hair, mad at Paragus

(1)-party/rui.html.title: Rui
(1)-party/rui.html.description: Player: Marlo (she/her?)5' 5" without horns, 5' 10" with, horns go straight upInfobox

(1)-party/wahlen.html.title: Wahlen
(1)-party/wahlen.html.description:
Player: Andrew (he/they)Infobox
Wahlenüí´ made their way into town where Akenai Sachio greeted him and berated him for being late. After the events of the festival, Akenai disappeared and no one around town seemed to know of an Akenai. The only known information is that a Yokai lord shares her name and that she did not pass through Samni. 
After picking up a blade that was used for a ritual, Wahlenüí´ recovered a memory. Akenai stood next to a man who was seemingly appealing to Terrada about a small shard of prismatic glass he held. After a small discussion they were denied. Terrada then addressed Wahlenüí´ saying that his trust was broken and the topic was supposed to stay between them.
During the slaughter of Ninnan Gate, Wahlenüí´ saw a hooded figure for just a moment. Perhaps it was the trick of the light, but no one else seemed to notice him.

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(0)-onwards-to-spr.title: (0) Onwards to Spring
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(0)-onwards-to-spr.description:
At last. A celebration of spring is no longer held in the capital of Samni. Saohun has been permitted to hold a small festival in the town and all around the area have been given the opportunity to attend. For whatever reason, you have come here as well. Be it to buy from traders, sell to the mass foot traffic, or just experience the majesty of Spring‚Äôs rise. 
As the sun set and Lord Talvec began to introduce himself, he quickly took his own life spawning what are theorized to be Yokai which the party managed to quickly dispatch.

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(1)-a-shrine-maide.title: (1) A Shrine Maiden is Neither Late Nor Early
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(1)-a-shrine-maide.description: The heir of Clan Talvec, Yari Talvec, has worries about the local Shrine Maiden not appearing. The party has been hired to go investigate her whereabouts. After arriving at the shrine, the party was stopped by 3 men claiming they were members of a different Shrine Maiden. After a fight, the party investigated the shrine, finding a small creature and a crazed shrine maiden named Lleth. The creature fled, slamming two talismans together, one yellow and one green. The party did the same with some they had found transporting them to a different realm where they spoke with Terrada, King of the Yokai. The king claimed that the festival incident and what happened to the shrine maiden was due to another lord of the Yokai, Oharah Sachio, launching attacks. They returned to the shrine with the small Yokai creature that was in service of the king named Gooma where the shrine maiden was healed. The king offered to have the party join his retinue to stop Oharah, but they instead settled on working adjacent to each other and helping where they could.
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(1)-a-shrine-maide.sourcePath: (2) Campaign/0-Quests/(1) A Shrine Maiden is Neither Late Nor Early.md

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(2)-under-new-mana.title: (2) Under New Management
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(2)-under-new-mana.description: Macko had been given his first command by his father, Akibara Shuki. He is to lead Shiori‚≠ê, Ceolüî•, Rui‚õÑ, and Wahlenüí´ to Kaminan to clear out rumored invading monsters and then meet at Ninnan Gate, a stronghold in Samni. As they arrived at Kaminan, the party was met with over a dozen small creatures known as Krasue. Upon dispatching them, the leader seemed to summon a much larger one known as a Dokkabei which they once again killed with ease. After pursuing the fleeing leader into a bog where a Jabbaku swallowed the leader whole. As the fight with the massive brambly beast ensued, everyone was on their last legs where Rui‚õÑ delivered the final blow to the massive beast. Now they set out for Ninnan Gate.

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(3)-i-bid-that-fla.title: (3) I Bid That Flames Return
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(3)-i-bid-that-fla.description:
As the party was hired by the Shuki Family, it was revealed that Akaza is the Tekina of Fire and has not yet been able to transform into Ryu. But as the threat of a sub section of Yatari moving towards Samni, Ryu is needed if Samni is to face the might of an opposing Aikon. 
The night before Akaza was to enter a Taor ruin to hopefully complete his transformation. Ninnan Gate was attacked by a group that bore colors from the Land of Leaves. The party managed to repel the small attacking force including a Gakus Tank Samurai, which they were able to find some had infiltrated their ranks. Shiori‚≠ê tried to warn Akibara and Akaza too late. Akibara was slain and Akaza embodied the form of Ryu, disintegrating Shiori‚≠ê in the process. While this happened, the party got a splitting headache causing them to fall to the ground where they were able to see a man in front of them catch on fire and burn into the form of a Second Aikon of Fire leading to the death of Ryu. That night, Ninnan Gate and Samni fell.
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(3)-i-bid-that-fla.sourcePath: (2) Campaign/0-Quests/(3) I Bid That Flames Return.md

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(4)-a-guttering-li.title: (4) A Guttering Light
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(4)-a-guttering-li.description:
The last thing that was seen was the party being pulled out of rubble. The only thing left living at Ninnan Gate seemingly. 
Fading in and out of deep slumber and being fed berries that nourished them while also keeping them in said deep slumber, the party found themselves in shackles on a cart. In the brief moments they awoke, they realized they each were in a cell, still shackled, and being questioned. Over many loops of falling into a slumber, awaking in a haze, and being questioned, the loop had finally ended. A small group consisting of Yari Talvec, Paragus and Barolt Kou, Enokaga Aritomi, and one other eluded to break Ceolüî•, Rui‚õÑ, and Wahlenüí´ out. After mentioning that Heraüëø was also there, Paragus and Barolt went to find her ordering the others to leave. As they did so, they discovered they were in a mass industrial factory in Ikcho known as Imugi Arcaneworks
As they continued on, alarm bells began to ring throughout the area and a Samurai tried to stop them. Yari told them to leave and the last the party saw of Yari was him against the Samurai in a very one sided battle not in his favor. The party finally reached their escape route which was an unfinished mining tunnel. They began to drive a large cart down the tunnel, the four fending off pursuers and eventually a large construct. Unable to stop the cart, it ran off an incomplete rail way, tumbling into rapids below.

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(5)-superstitions-.title: (5) Superstitions Put to Steel
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(5)-superstitions-.description: The four were able to pull themselves out of the rushing river, where they finally were able to take a breath. Enokaga revealed to them that they had been captured for nearly half a year, given they were in the North Eastern part of Ikcho. Not wanting to stay any longer than they had to, the party made their way to a roadside inn after a long day of traveling. The inn keeper was hesitant to let them in given it was the night of Veylfall, a night every quarter of the year where it is believed the more monstrous parts of the world become braver and more viscous. They eventually convinced him and they were let in and got some rest. The innkeeper mentioned his son hadn‚Äôt come back and the party offered to find him. Overjoyed, the innkeeper gave Wahlenüí´ a good luck charm of Levin and said his son wore its twin. They then set off to find his son at a sacrificial area known as Bloodshore Rock. With Heraüëø‚Äôs arrival coming just before they left, the group set off to Bloodshore Rock and found nearly fifty feral Abhumans along with a man dressed in red silk robes and a fox max with a tied and gagged man in tow. As he chanted, the party intervened, cutting through the mass amount of bodies until Rui‚õÑ was able to kill the man revealing it was the innkeeper's son. Wahlenüí´ then grabbed the man's blade causing a vision and a surge of power in the party. Right after this happened, the Taor ruins lit up with a guardian moving towards them to which they fled, going back to the inn. Along the way, they met a noble house at arms, Clan Liotus, finishing off the Abhumans that escaped the party‚Äôs wrath. They got a ride from them to the inn where they discovered the innkeeper holed up in his room with dozens upon dozens of tiny holes each containing a small worm that made up the food they had eaten. The innkeeper said that his name did not matter and that he was now something called Legion. Legion claimed that the time of the Yokai has been forgotten, and they will have their due. Ceolüî• then killed him in a burning blaze and ensuring that every worm inside them was killed.

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(6)-a-chance-encou.title: (6) A Chance Encounter
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(6)-a-chance-encou.description:
As the party has joined House Liotus heading Northward, winter draws ever closer. They are still a minimum of a three month travel from the border without weather delays. 
As winter came full force to the traveling caravan, they were significantly slowed down. As time went on, more and more people started going missing from the caravan until the remnants of the group were encountered by a small group of Yokai. The party vanquished them leaving them as the only survivors of the caravan. On the Yokai were simple instructions. "Bring me Wahlenüí´ and Ceolüî•, signed, your lord."
They then went to House Aclassi's estate where Serai asked Heraüëø to attend a meeting in Iron Blossom Keep to see why her father was invited. Now they travel, hopefully to avoid the oncoming battle which could possibly start the first declaration of war after Ulone‚Äôs death. 
As they arrived, Heraüëø was greeted by Ganra Dokugan, showing her what Heraüëø‚Äôs father was participating in. His creations were gemstones fused with pieces of the once thought indestructible Taor ruins allowing the non magically inclined to cast spells with seemingly no limit. After showing his work, Heraüëø and Ganra made their way to the summit between Yatari and Ikcho. Throughout the summit, Yatari was obviously disinterested in an alliance while Ikcho was outraged at this, implying they had dealings in the past. After nearly an hour of discussion, Ganra proudly proclaimed that Tsuchigomo would take the field. Heraüëø was told to leave but managed to snoop on a conversation between Ganra and a woman from Yatari, Kazera, the Tekina of the Wind. In her snooping, Heraüëø could tell that they were more than friendly in stark contrast between their regions. As she left, Heraüëø saw the carnage of the battlefield and the group decided they needed to make a quick exit. As they began to leave, the group was ambushed and stopped by a group of bearers from the Holy Empire. After determining that they were friends of Ikcho, the bearers put away their weapons and introduced themselves as the Pale Blades. Biast was the leader, Aevis seemingly the scout, and Wyvern the ‚Äòhinge of the operation‚Äô. As the bearers tried to evacuate them, Tsuchigomo rose up causing mayhem to the battlefield only for Yuki-Onna to rise as well thus creating a chaotic fight between Aikons which the party was at mercy to the collateral damage. After several minutes of evading boulders, splits in the earth, massive icicles, and the massive form of Tsuchigomo, they finally were spared a moment to breathe. As they pressed forward, the bearers found their target, the Tekina of Ice. They quickly moved in to kill her along with the Umi Kiba and the party joined them. Rui‚õÑ managed to stab the Tekina of Ice which the Tekina simply said ‚Äòthank you‚Äô before grabbing onto Rui‚õÑ‚Äôs head causing a mass amount of pain until Rui‚õÑ fell unconscious and the Tekina laid dead. Biast commanded Wyvern to take Rui‚õÑ‚Äôs head as he didn‚Äôt wish to take any chances with strange magic. Wyvern went to kill her but with his large dog, Akira, trying to stop him and recognizing her white skin, Wyvern realized he recognized her. Aevis pushed aside Wyvern as he went catatonic only for Aevis to be killed by reinforcements from the Umi Kiba. After the party dispatched them, Biast ordered Wyvern to kill Rui‚õÑ which Wyvern denied and began to fight Biast. After another fight that began to wear the party down, Wyvern was revealed to be Macko Shuki. More reinforcements arrived from the Umi Kiba only for a deafening roar to sound as lightning struck, spreading to each and every Umi Kiba, kicking up dust. From the dust, Paragus Kou emerged, telling the group to follow him through a portal as Rui‚õÑ‚Äôs blinding pain began to return.

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(7)-fanning-embers.title: (7) Fanning Embers
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(7)-fanning-embers.description: As they arrived in a new place underground, held up by broken pieces of a Taor ruin. Rui‚õÑ was carried to a makeshift medical bay, where Yari healed her as best as he could. Paragus then spoke to each party member one by one, asking about what happened at Ninnan Gate. After speaking to everyone. He gathered the group and told them that his small hideaway for deserters, outlaws, and heretics was open to them as long as they needed. But asked them for help in finding the Second Tekina of Fireüí´ which they all agreed. Now they have been ordered to rest and settle in. After some rest and sheltering from a massive storm, the group set out towards a nearby village, Lostwing, to pick up the trail on the Second Aikon of Fire. As they made their way through a large bamboo forest, the Guardian was following them. After a fight and some mistakes from Wahlenüí´, the guardian continued to follow them, although far slower. As they arrived in Lostwing, it was dead silent. As they made their way through the small village, they found the scout for Paragus, Enokaga (gator lady), and a small group of bearers that had been interrogated. After being discovered by a Royal scout (soldier from Yatari), they ran into Kazera, the Tekina of the Wind. She summoned a creature that the group quickly dispatched of before Paragus and Enokaga arrived Enokaga. Kazera revealed that Paragus was a previous commander for Yatari. Before the two could fight, Kazera was called away as one of the soldiers called out that Royal forces had secured the Tekina. With a blast of wind, the Tekina and Royalists disappeared. Enokaga was then sent after to pick up their trail leaving the group to rest.

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(8)-inferno-in-the.title: (8) Inferno in the Night
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(8)-inferno-in-the.description: In the middle of the night, the group was woken up by Paragus. Enokaga had found that the royalists were holed up in a nearby fort last used in the Great War. After fighting through Royalist forces, they were corralled into a shrine to Levin where Kazera waited for them, she and Paragus had a small spat about him leaving Yatari. It came to a head with the two brawling and Paragus having the advantage before two summons overpowered him, leading to a swift defeat. Kazera then ordered her summons to kill the party and after a few moments they came out victorious. A very battered and heavily injured Paragus told them to stop Kazera as she had wings and could easily fly away with the second Tekina of fire. As they made their way to the rooftop of the fort, Kazera offered for them to be part of Yatari which the party quickly declined. A brutal fight ensued with many close calls, bountiful strokes of luck, and unrelenting will. But they had defeated the Tekina of wind. As Hera went to deliver the final blow, ribbons of green energy came from Kazera and went into Wahlen‚Äôs chest before spreading to each party member. The four fell to the ground in pain and screamed in agony before Wahlen heard a ‚Äòthere you are‚Äô. A memory then ensued for Wahlen where he was seemingly in a much more technologically advanced world on a ship with his friend Ohara Sachio. The memory ended with a black haired and well dressed man with an ethereal purple sword saying ‚ÄòI‚Äôm waiting, Wahlen‚Äô. As the group awoke, they all felt they had booms of power. As Kazera stood once again to kill them, her magic seemed to be gone. After being evacuated by Royal soldiers, they fled into the forest. Rui pursued and slaughtered the remaining guards with Kazera only being left. With a scream, a tempest raged around them forming a tornado as Tengu arose, blowing away Rui. As the group exited the fort, they saw the tempest raging and consuming the forest while Wahlen heard a calling from the tornado. After much disagreement, the group made their way into the tornado where only Wahlen, Paragus, and Macko saw a hooded man. As they continued, the hooded man stopped at a cliff's edge, Wahlen asked who he was, and what could be seen from him just smiled and fell off the cliff before Tengu attacked them. After another brutal fight, Wahlen took an opportunity to finish off Tengu, and after much wrangling and slashing, he had killed Tengu and was on a different floating island in the tornado. Moments later, Tengu rose again, no worse for wear as it was seemingly just playing with its prey. It began to squeeze Wahlen, cracking ribs and squeezing him to death. Wahlen‚Äôs last words were: ‚ÄòI will not let you stand in my way!‚Äô

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(9)-awaken....html.title: (9) Awaken...
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(9)-awaken....html.description: Fire surrounded Wahlen before a dome of fire erupted from him, blowing Tengu away. Amidst the storm it was nearly blinding as a pillar of fire burned revealing Wahlen in the form of Yamakaen, Aikon of Inferno. After a devastating fight to both each other and the land, Yamakaen was victorious and began to make its way to attack the party. Paragus transformed into the dragon of spring, electrocuting Yamakaen and knocking it unconscious. Wahlen was unconscious but alive and the group made their way back to the hideaway. The beast that destroyed a nation. The Aikon that destroyed so many lives. The man that burned away two Aikons‚Ä¶was with them all along. Awaken to crack the heavens, Wahlen.

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(10)-the-wages-of-.title: (10) The Wages of Guilt
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(10)-the-wages-of-.description: After getting back and after some dreams occurred, Wahlen was released from his confinements as Paragus asked the group to meet up with Enokaga and his colleague he called upon. After arriving at the drowned boughs, they found Paragus colleague, Praxis Tryggur as well as Enokaga being ambushed by Hikari Seiji soldiers with a kagenami samurai. The samurai told them to stop while Hikari Seiji did not listen. A fight ensued where the Samurai, Lord Tsuga Kitakuri, helped the party defend Enokaga. After the fighting ceased, he told Hera he had a message from her father. His father asked Hera to return which Hera denied. The lord departed and they talked to Enokaga who informed them that the hooded man was seen making his way towards Samni with a companion. The party theorized that he was heading towards Ninnan gate with his companion. After convincing Yari to join them and Macko refusing to work with his brother's killer. The group set out and made their way to a small village where they were recognized by Hinatsuru Shuki, the lady of Samni. After a small chat and tea, they set out for Ninnan gate where Wahlen saw the cloaked man enter the Taor ruin under the stronghold. They followed and were locked in the Taor ruin with a voice saying ‚ÄòThreat level: Minoris‚Äô.

(2)-campaign/0-quests/(11)-where-it-all-.title: (11) Where It All Began
(2)-campaign/0-quests/(11)-where-it-all-.description: As they progressed through the ruins fighting through constructs far more advanced than anything they had seen before and solving complex puzzles (that weren‚Äôt that complex and took them like 20 minutes by brute forcing it), they arrived at a large open area which the voice declared them a higher threat level before deploying a ‚ÄòKuchika‚Äô. After a tough fight, they proceeded to the final room where they saw a mural of a venerated humanoid figure with six wings. Two of a dragons, two of a birds, and two of a Heili dragons. There was also a combination lock with seven characters similar to the one the party saw while captured by the Kagenami. As Wahlen stared upon the mural, a massive headache formed followed by the world going greyscale and time seemingly stopping. Wahlen was then confronted with the hooded man and answered the question of ‚Äòwho are you?‚Äô With ‚ÄòYou. We are you.‚Äô  The hooded man lowered his hood showing that he was an exact mirror image of Wahlen. Wahlen then went through a gauntlet of having to face who he was. A man with so much power but no understanding of who he is. First he faced Yamakaen, then a clone of himself, then the clone of himself transformed into a fox-like figure. Wahlen accepted the truth and took on a transformation of his own and won the fight accepting that he is the Tekina of inferno. He is Yamakaen. The group then exited the Taor ruin.

(2)-campaign/2-factions/emerging/hikari-.title: Hikari Seiji
(2)-campaign/2-factions/emerging/hikari-.description: The now rulers of Samni with their forces known as ‚ÄòShinsei-Ban‚Äô or ‚ÄòDawnblades‚Äô more casually. Their forces are led by Shino Korin Hikari, Tekina of Komyoryu, warden of light. After their retreat to the land of Samni, they quickly established their rule with none to oppose them and established a new holy order once again worshipping Levin and the other gods. They have attempted many more plays for power since they certainly have the force to do so. But as of right now they have been unsuccessful other than their conquering of Samni.

(2)-campaign/2-factions/emerging/kagenam.title: Kagenami
(2)-campaign/2-factions/emerging/kagenam.description: The Kagenami first showed themselves on the night of Samni‚Äôs extinguishing and bore the same steel and appearance of Samurai but have since claimed they are not in direct association with the land of reeds, only that they are a splinter group. The Samurai have not made any attempts to stop or impede them in any way however. As of now, the Kagenami have a standing agreement with the Imugi arcane works, a main part of Samni led by Ganra Dokugan, Tekina of Tsuchigomo, warden of Earth.

(2)-campaign/2-factions/emerging/no-kura.title: No-Kurai
(2)-campaign/2-factions/emerging/no-kura.description: Also known as the blades of Amanozako, or ‚Äòflawless blades‚Äô. After driving out the Hikari Seiji, Yatari was put under their rule with the leader being Arasuda Tenbatsu, Tekina of Amanozako. Under his rule, Yatari was turned into a Yokoku where one lord presides. Yatari now often practices experiments with the Suteki, which was once outlawed by the Samurai. After driving out the Hikari Seiji, they have been content since.

(2)-campaign/2-factions/emerging/umi-kib.title: Umi Kiba
(2)-campaign/2-factions/emerging/umi-kib.description: Also commonly known as ‚ÄòMaelstrom‚Äô. After the events of Ninnan Gate, they rose from the seas attacking those on the coast without mercy. This faction is entirely made up of Triton but other Triton claim the Umi Kiba do not represent them and are a deviant group. Their tactics have found success along the coast and seek to find more as they unveiled their own Tekina, specifically the one of Yuki-Onna. This would mark the first time in nearly fifty years that Yuki-Onna has appeared.

(2)-campaign/3-people/1-party/shiori/aka.description: Max 19 years oldThe spitting image of a noble‚Äôs son. He is frail looking, slightly pale, and is dressed in fine silks. His blonde hair runs down to his cheeks and his green eyes are those of unburdened ones. He is the Tekina of Ryu, warden of fire, but met his end from a second Aikon of fire at Ninnan gate.

(2)-campaign/3-people/1-party/shiori/aki.description: Ruler of Samni and Macko's and Akaza's father

(2)-campaign/3-people/1-party/shiori/mac.title: Macko
(2)-campaign/3-people/1-party/shiori/mac.description:
Shiori‚≠ê's brother
Is a Sea Ronin Silver white hairThe white haired son of the Shuki family. His long white hair often is seen going down to his middle back covering most of the back of his light blue haori. His tanned skin and blue eyes match with his clothing but contrast against his hair. He often carries two odachi sized cleaver sabers that are connected by a long chain. Before their disbandment, he was the Sea Ronin‚Äôs third in command but had only ever led one mission.  He was his brother's shield, promising to protect the blessing he had and his family forevermore. As the second Aikon of Fire appeared, he was consumed by its flame leaving his fate unknown, as a body was never found at Ninnan gate.

(2)-campaign/3-people/kou's/barolt-kou.h.description: A young man wearing a furred wolf head that seems to be stitched at the neck. A large brand is upon his chest that‚Äôs easily seen as he is shirtless and the rest of his body is sported with ragged black clothing. He is nothing short of feral, wearing a collar that seemingly controls the fits of ferocity.

(2)-campaign/3-people/kou's/paragus-kou..title: Paragus Kou
(2)-campaign/3-people/kou's/paragus-kou..description:
A human in his late 40‚Äôs with short black hair and a slender build. Scars layer his fingers that are mostly covered in bronze rings. His eyes have a seemingly yellow and slit like look to them that contrasts against his dark layered robes. He was revealed to be the vessel for the Dragon of Spring and current outlaw in most regions due to his freeing of bearers to conduct research for his son. 
He was previously the Lord Taisho of Yatari (essentially high commander) before he betrayed the emperor, Arasuda Tenbatsu, and his previous wife, Kazera: Tekina of the Wind

(2)-campaign/3-people/pale-blades/aevis..title: Aevis
(2)-campaign/3-people/pale-blades/aevis..description: Scout of the Pale Blades

(2)-campaign/3-people/talvec's/lord-talv.description: Yari Talvec's father. Died in (0) Onwards to Spring.

(2)-campaign/3-people/talvec's/samurai-t.title: Samurai Talvec

(2)-campaign/3-people/talvec's/yari-talv.title: Yari Talvec
(2)-campaign/3-people/talvec's/yari-talv.description:
5' 3"A Yuan-Ti man that hardly looks old enough to drink. Bits of golden scales around his neck, cheeks, and forearms match his striking golden blonde hair. He‚Äôs built rather stocky compared to the average person of his race but is also significantly shorter standing at five foot four. He is always seen with his chokuo at his hip, sheathed in a saya of golden emblems from the House Talvec. 
After the death of his grandfather, he was thrust into the position of leadership of Saohun and the clan despite only being a fledgling. He is now possibly marked a traitor for his organization of the Imugi Arcaneworks infiltration.

(2)-campaign/3-people/enokaga-aritomi.ht.title: Enokaga Aritomi
(2)-campaign/3-people/enokaga-aritomi.ht.description:
Bearer from Saohun, owns a gator
Fair, lady-like, graceful, and charming are words used to directly contrast what Enokaga is. She is a massive bovine abhuman bearer standing at six foot five without her horns with a muscular build of an overworked farmer and warrior. Her greasy and messy blonde hair with splotches of black matches the brown ragged clothing typical for a bearer. Her native magic seems to be that of stone. Currently serves as a scout for Paragus Kou.Side note: Literally everyone forgets her name until I say ‚ÄòGator lady‚Äô.

(2)-campaign/3-people/gyota.html.title: Gyota
(2)-campaign/3-people/gyota.html.description:
Lady Ayame Liotus' cousin hired him... Then her cousin died, now he's a grief counselor
Monkey called Mr. Banana
Met in Session 8

(2)-campaign/4-locations/suteki/suteki.h.title: Suteki
(2)-campaign/4-locations/suteki/suteki.h.description: Basically the complete opposite to the material plane. The immaterium. This is where people are believed to go when dying if they are not within the good graces of Levin. It‚Äôs Celestia, it‚Äôs Hell, it‚Äôs the Abyss, it‚Äôs the astral plane. Basically every plane in your standard D&D game other than the material plane. People don‚Äôt know shit about it other than when you Misty step, you go there, and that it‚Äôs bad.

(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/ikcho/ikc.title: Ikcho
(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/ikcho/ikc.description: Ikcho is often hailed as the land of creativity and is easily a hundred years ahead of every other region due to the creations they keep for themselves. They are responsible for almost every non rudimentary item or structure you see.

(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/land-of-l.title: Land of Leaves
(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/land-of-l.description: Named after the leaves that fall on the ground from the great Levin. Levin resides in the middle of this region and can even be seen over the whistling mountains. This is where the Samurai train fledglings and grant them their rights as rulers. Only the highest of nobility, and those who would become samurai are allowed to traverse on this golden land.

(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/samni/bul.title: Bulga

(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/samni/kam.title: Kaminan

(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/samni/sam.title: Samni
(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/samni/sam.description: Samni is located in the middle of the continent. Trade is the main factor of the economy here and is often considered the richest region. It‚Äôs not uncommon to see common folk with silk clothing and having the pocket change to hire Sea Ronin. They hold almost every festival, big or small.

(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/samni/sao.title: Saohun

(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/whistling.title: Whistling Mountains
(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/whistling.description: The largest mountain range in Ulone. It separates the land of leaves from the rest of the region. It‚Äôs mostly uninhabited other than non Heili dragons (Your standard European dragon), rumors of what should be long extinct Oni, and cult of the Helix dragons at the base.

(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/yatari/ya.title: Yatari
(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/yatari/ya.description:
Yatari is known as the region whose worship can be felt from miles away. They are undying to their gods and will use their religious fervor to harness magic. This is where most if not all shrine maidens come from. Some may call them fanatics to the missing Yatari or the gods themselves, but to claim they are ineffective in their ways is unfounded as you can see a shrine maiden in almost every town even outside Yatari. One person in charge, the Tekina of Darkness
Hikari Seiji attacked Yatari

(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/taor.html.title: Taor
(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/taor.html.description: While not necessarily a region itself, it is found in almost every region. The Taor are ancient ruins said to have existed before the war. No one knows who their inhabitants were, but some theorize they were much more advanced given that the stone that make these ruins have never been broken. Be that from human attempts and natural phenomena. Taor ruins are restricted to everyone other than the leaders of the region. Anyone else found trespassing will be given punishment.

(2)-campaign/4-locations/ulone/ulone-(la.title: Ulone (Land)

(2)-campaign/4-locations/ninnan-gate.htm.title: Ninnan Gate
(2)-campaign/4-locations/ninnan-gate.htm.description: A stronghold in Samni

(2)-campaign/4-locations/tansho.html.title: Tansho

(2)-campaign/5-misc/monsters/gakus-tank-.title: Gakus Tank Samurai
(2)-campaign/5-misc/monsters/gakus-tank-.description: Scary guy that goes into stealth and uses shadows. Shine a light on them.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/monsters/jabbaku.htm.title: Jabbaku
(2)-campaign/5-misc/monsters/jabbaku.htm.description: A very scary plant-like monster with many brambles. It is HUGE.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/monsters/krasue.html.title: Krasue

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/abhuman.html.title: Abhuman

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/bearers.html.title: Bearers
(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/bearers.html.description: This name is given to the mutant races or ones that naturally have magic, excluding Yuan-ti and Triton, They are also known as the ‚Äòslave race‚Äô or ‚ÄòMarked‚Äô as they are property for the superior races. Ink is cast on their face to mark them, removal of this brand carries the possibility of death as poison can leak into veins. Buying a new bearer is commonplace, but the bearers who are able to fight cost quite a good amount. Attempting to remove their brand is punishable by death for the bearer and anyone involved.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/changelings.ht.title: Changelings

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/dragonborn.htm.title: Dragonborn
(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/dragonborn.htm.description: Said to be an offshoot of the Yuan-Ti, Dragonborn are incredibly rare and are rumored to be fallen scales from the Heili dragons. No one has confirmed if this is true, but as of right now, it‚Äôs treated as fact.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/dwarves.html.title: Dwarves
(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/dwarves.html.description: The second most common race. However unlike humans they are often revered due to simply being the same race as Ulone. They might even get a pass for not addressing a samurai as ‚Äòlord‚Äô or ‚Äòlady‚Äô.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/elves.html.title: Elves

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/gnomes.html.title: Gnomes

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/half-elves.htm.title: Half Elves
(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/half-elves.htm.description: The start of the less common races, half elves are spared persecution due to their ancestors switching sides in the Great War. But they are on a very thin line. It‚Äôs not uncommon for them to be refused service. Just penance for their ancestors' actions.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/halfling.html.title: Halfling
(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/halfling.html.description: One of the newer races, it is said that Levin took the holy parts of the Dwarves to create a new race fit. These are rather uncommon but often have kind souls and generally fit right in with Dwarves.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/humans.html.title: Humans
(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/humans.html.description: The most common species in Ulone, therefore most samurai and higher individuals are human. Overall they have a very neutral standing with people as they never did anything world changing in the war.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/orcs.html.title: Orcs

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/tabaxi.html.title: Tabaxi
(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/tabaxi.html.description: Also known as ‚ÄòNoyona‚Äô, they are a race of felines, sometimes having only cat eyes and other times looking entirely like a cat. They are the oldest of the more uncommon races as it is said that Ulone created them. There are even some rumors that one was his wife.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/tekina.html.title: Tekina

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/tieflings.html.title: Tieflings
(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/tieflings.html.description: Levin created them.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/triton.html.title: Triton
(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/triton.html.description: While hailing from the sea, they are not all necessarily sea ronin but do come with the innate power to command water and are the one race aside from Yuan-ti that are given the magical exemption. They are the youngest of the new races and it‚Äôs not rare to see one as a bodyguard.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/yokai.html.title: Yokai

(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/yuan-ti.html.title: Yuan-Ti
(2)-campaign/5-misc/races/yuan-ti.html.description: The last of the common races and have a general attracting aura around them. They are quick to make friends, possibly because their scales resemble that of the Heili dragon‚Äôs. But make no mistake, they were seen as one of, if not the greatest fighters in the war.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/veil-lost.html.title: Veil Lost
(2)-campaign/5-misc/veil-lost.html.description: Insane, losing personhoodSome have been known to band together or cast spells. Think of returning to a primal state, thinking of non-Veil Lost as enemies. They have been known to fight among themselves. The biggest common factor is that strength and speed are magnified.

(2)-campaign/5-misc/veylfall.html.title: Veylfall
(2)-campaign/5-misc/veylfall.html.description: A night every quarter of the year where it is believed the more monstrous parts of the world become braver and more viscous

4 x Fire Sticks Gourd of sobriety Ruby of the War Mage
Wahlenüí´ gave Rui‚õÑ these:
A handful of Yellow Talismans and Green Talismans

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-1.html.title: Session 1
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-1.html.description:
The land of Ulone was blessed in the land of the mother leaves; Temptation lures us into the leaves shadow.
Everyone arrives at a spring festival sponsored and hosted by the House Talvec in Saohun whose leader is High Lord Admiral Talvek:
We open with a vision from Shiori‚≠ê: canine beast fights dragon that tunnels down a cavern where the beast stabs the dragon They talks to their company, they are companions.
Has a shiba inu familiar, Akaza!
Heraüëø walks into town, late 40s older man accompanying her along with a shirtless man in lags and a wolf head who has not spoken their entire journey. Hair in braided ponytail, heavy armor, pale, giant sword
Wahlenüí´ is met by a blonde Tabaxi woman, ushering them inside a booth... "How do you not know what you are doing, you've been with the guild 2 years..."
Ceolüî• arrives on a work order, meets the gator wrestling woman who hired him. large shield, ruby beard, old man, comically oversized scroll and a broken sword on back
Rui‚õÑ arrives, getting hoxed into a contest of strength... They destroy the competition getting a reward.
Has a red panda familiar, Bam Bam!
Wahlenüí´ steals Rui‚õÑ's reward because Rui‚õÑ is a sucker and then gets most of the party to drink experimental tea from Akenai. Tea of "minor harmless effects."
The hosting Samurai Talvec has an announcement, after having his 100 titles announced...
‚ÄúThe time of Suteki is nigh. Let it be the harrowed moon red in the crimson carrowbird appearance. Let us all rejoice for we are not rulers.‚Äù then Talvek slits his throat which drains black blood and beings with fox masks crawl out Combat ensues, toughest enemy dies, we find [7 white ceramic shards] seemingly from a mask; creatures are a type of yokai (other worldly)
Talvek‚Äôs grandson is taking up the samurai title; his father is no samurai The spring dragon did not pass over
Akenai is missing and alligator lady said they did not have a potion seller on the docket Grandson says he hasn‚Äôt heard from their shrine maiden since last week who recently dealt with a yokai incursion and hires us to investigate

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-2.html.title: Session 2
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-2.html.description:
The party has a morning greeting to one another in the barn they were staying in... Shiori‚≠ê is awoken my Macko. Macko is excited about their new job!
Shiori‚≠ê is worried about Akaza, saying he must prove himself before he can join us... "If you can control your powers you can come."
Ceolüî• has a tea ritual almost every morning, offers everyone some
Ceolüî• points out that Shiori‚≠ê is the sister to the heir to the throne... Akaza?
Ceolüî• was in the war of the Great Shattering, ~200-300 years ago
Rui‚õÑ is from Ikcho. Macko notes that a lot of radical Yatarians fight with a similar flowery dance style The party sets out to the shrine... A LOT of dead birds belly up on the road, as if fallen out of their air. No sickness. Necromancy magic
Guarded, something wrong inside, another Shrine Maiden went inside to protect Lleth Somethings feels off, we fight LOOT: 1x yellow and 1x green talisman Inside the shrine... Everything is destroyed and looks discredited. The shrine maiden is tied to a chair, hood over head, talismans on body
Dude with face of pug, looks like a bear, hooves, named Gooma (?)
"Tell Oharah I said go fuck himself!" - he poofs away and we hear shuffling away
He smashes a yellow and green talisman together, a grey area forming before he jumps in, looks like the Suteki We smash the talismans the same way,
Terrada - Silver hair going to hips, fox hair ears, Sephiroth with less aura
He assumes we are with Oharah. We ask who that is
Oharah is responsible for the festival and Lleth by letting the Suteki into her mind... They were trying to "help" Lleth
Kitsune - Terrada, current king of Yokai, Oharah is a rebellious youth who has gathered a lot of support... We are in the realm of Suteki
The talismans are "a being made manifest" that can extract the Suteki influence
Levin stops Terrada from coming to the mortal plane... Levin didn't appreciate what they did in the Great War
Why did Oharah attack the festival?
He opens a window showing a giant forest, where there are bunch of creatures fighting and regenerating... "Without consumption of people we go rabid...." Oharah blames him for this... Each Yokai needs to eat different parts of a human in order to live... Some blood, some flesh, etc.
Two icons have awakened in Yatari, Amanozako and Komyoryu, darkness and lightness Two entities clashed, one on a horse of darkness and a blade, the other is flying and is in the form of a dragon
Wahlenüí´'s book is like Zhokan's book
Macko and Shiori‚≠ê
They've gone without the summer dragon for 19 years already.... The boy (Akaza) needs to become a man
Macko hasn't been allowed to go out on missions by his father... He wants to be ready badly
Tensions rise, Samni will prepare for a skirmish, Oharah would take root there

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-3.html.title: Session 3
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-3.html.description:
The Yari Talvec comes in to check in with Ceolüî•... Did we really go to the Suteki and meet the Yokai King?
This act is strictly against the Samurai Code He does not have the authority to protect or punish us... What should our fates be?
We meet with Macko's and Akaza's father, where Macko gets his first mission with us accompanying him
We are to investigate the town called Kaminan to the north where there have ben potential Yokai sightings. We are to determine if this is true or not, and if it is true we are to kill them. 25 gp each payout, 50 gold in basic supplies
Meanwhile Macko's father and Samni's leader is moving to Ninnan Gate to deal with this potential threat We buy a horse, carriage, and supplies A scene to haggle for a lower price
Wahlenüí´ buys 10 gp worth of spell supplies
Akaza and Macko play Yahtzee
Akibara Shuki, ruler of Samni and Macko's and Akaza's father
We meet Macko's and Akaza's mother, Hinatsuru Shuki, and she gives us information
Prophecy?: The reincarnation of Ryu will go into the ruins of Taor in Ninnan Gate and emerge to lead us into battle
Yatari is growing restless for war

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-4.html.title: Session 4
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-4.html.description:
Macko and Shiori‚≠ê have a moment in the training yard, talking and supporting one another
Scene with Rui‚õÑ and Akaza
Akaza really likes beetles & bugs and not talking about his responsibilities
Shiori‚≠ê is officially welcomed into the Shuki family... if there is a mirage... between her and Macko 10 day travel
We see a Krasu, similar to a goblin Kidnap it and interrogation
Javaku, bramble monster, not a Yokai

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-5.html.title: Session 5
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-5.html.description:
Heraüëø sees a Veylflood in Tansho...
Bearers have the Veil in them, too much causes the flood
Staying in it too long would become Veil Lost
We arrive at Ninnan Gate

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-6.html.title: Session 6
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-6.html.description:
Wahlenüí´ remembers the words from the person he saw that disappeared Ninnan Gate... "We have found you" in words spoken by unknown man
Captured by Kamanani, group of samurai that captured Samni...
We are brought to Imugi Arcaneworks Each person has a conference with unknown people, where we are trapped and shackled... Things are going wrong, they don't want the information we have They give us more and more berries, where we remain unconscious They are going to kill us
Our allies from Saohun come to save us...
Paragus Kou, Yari, Serai,
We get out, our Yari from Saohun staying behind to cover for us We fight on railroad tracks, holding off wave after wave of enemy before we see an opening... A construct chases us, we kill it before flying off the rails, falling into running water
We were drugged since Ninnan Gate, lost time... We were out for 6 months
Paragus Kou was supposed to find us at Ninnan Gate and saw that we were hauled away

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-7.html.title: Session 7
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-7.html.description:
Serai saves Heraüëø, dragging in her equipment
Serai and Heraüëø argue "You know father's madness, he could have just made that up?!"
Heraüëø is worried about her ring, putting it on quickly
A samurai from Saohun knows, old man with a dog thing, and a bearer.
Paragus Kou comes with his beast, checking on Heraüëø
They see a samurai fighting a fledgling that we know from Ninnan Gate...
Paragus Kou and Serai join the fight, letting Heraüëø run
Serai and Heraüëø "How will I find you again?" "You know where home is." "I love you..."
Paragus Kou turns into an orange dragon
Serai wields her father's blade
Heraüëø runs away, seeing the party. She tracks us...The party meets at the inn, catching up
Only real lead we have to our allies that helped us in (4) A Guttering Light is that Serai told Heraüëø that they could meet at home... 2-3 weeks away
We go to find the guy's son, Motomai, from (5) Superstitions Put to Steel
Bam Bam gets a scent, sprinting into the darkness
A floating carriage with spectral horses races past us, going to where we are trying to find Motomai
We come to a Taor ruin...
We see many Abhuman's in a place that looks like Bloodshore Rock A man with crimson red silk steps from the carriage, with someone blindfolded and bound in tow
Wahlenüí´ is standing next to Akenai and Terrada, a memory he does not remember....
Terrada is holding a small orb "We do not need to draw attention to ourselves"
"With you, me, and Wahlenüí´, we don't need to hide in the shadows anymore" "What advisor betrays his king?" Blade goes into the spine of the book then shuts
Heraüëø's feels strength going through
Rui‚õÑ's goes from head to toe swiftness and cold
Ceolüî•'s hammer, searing fire that now feels painless knowledge
Wahlenüí´'s knowledgeable weapon
House Liotus, once ruled by samurai, took the inn out, a lot of dead Abhumans that were once at the inn.
Lady Ayame Liotus Maggot inn-keeper, covered in holes...
Name is Legion
"I am something Levin forgot..."
Veylfall, the Yokai became so used to what it was... Humanity built better defenses against Veylfall and resisted the Yokai

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-8.html.title: Session 8
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-8.html.description:
We are traveling with House Liotus... A blizzard is approaching... People start going missing over the course of days, we were once 40, now we're 30
Some people think it's just people leaving the army, some think it's the Yuki-onna
Rui‚õÑ talks to Naria, a scared soldier who doesn't know what to do with the people going missing... They explain what guns are too, a creation of Arcaneworks
Grief council Gyota, face painted, monkey, rosy cheeks, blue hair... Wahlenüí´ goes in and gets traumatized... Rui‚õÑ goes in, the person has a different set of paint on their face...
A whole cart of 5 disappear, we see the bodies again in a cart... The bodies have the napes of the neck gone... We assume this is the work of a Yokai
Wahlenüí´ found a note, he tells no one: Your Lord Bring me Wahlenüí´ and Ceolüî•
Wahlenüí´ put a worm from Legion onto one of the dead Yokai
Tekina of Tsuchigomo, wants Heraüëø's house to meet at the border
Heraüëø's dad, Himoto, is already there
Enokaga goes back to Saohun
Rui‚õÑ goes through Heraüëø's old bedroom because she's nosy
We put a mattress from Heraüëø's home in a cart then left

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-9.html.title: Session 9
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-9.html.description:
Party headed towards Iron Blossom Keep... The land looks like a desert, which is wrong... It should be lush this time of year
Himoto was claimed to be busy
Ganra Dokugan, Tekina of Tsuchigomo, greets us, trusting that Heraüëø would be safe
Wahlenüí´ feels the book give him a message...
Heraüëø talks with Ganra Dokugan...
She is given a magic crystal that shoots out a beam, normal people can use it, it doesn't feel limited... It's a part of a Taor ruin
Himoto, Heraüëø's father, is in charge of this enterprise. But he has not gotten his daughters involved It is "in the works" that this power could be used on a larger scale (mega death star vibes)
Heraüëø gets a crystal, giving her eldritch blast for free?!
Heraüëø and Ganra Dokugan enter the summit...
People are already arguing: Gunshi Kage (military strategist, old man), Arbiter Abidia Hashin, Second Gunshi Arubia (Ikcho) Not a peace treaty deal, too many military people... People are arguing, some promised people in battle but not delivering, more and more arguing As the screaming dies down, a woman speaks up
Dwarves of Ikcho drove back enemies in the first war
Ganra Dokugan warns us to LEAVE, there will be a battle
Kazera, "The Breath of Wind", states that Ganra Dokugan is going to hunt "The Snow Queen" now
A full battle breaks out, Ikcho getting pushed back...
As the party is leaving, 3 bearers ambush us... They wear armor of Yatari, they are trying to escort people out of battle
3 Bearers from the Hikari Seiji
2 large blades, Wyvern
Biyast, in charge
Light on feet, short blade, Avis
A giant hand comes out from the ground, Tsuchigomo
A small crystal forms in the sky as a blizzard comes, a catlike Yuki-onna bursting from the crystal
Cannons from Ikcho fire at the Yuki-onna, Tsuchigomo approaching... Two Aikon fight, an event that has only happened once in history
We fall, running from the battle of Aikons
Heraüëø and Rui‚õÑ fall behind, the Yuki-onna hovering above them... They dodge the ice shards before running through the footprints of Tsuchigomo
Ceolüî• and Heraüëø fall and become unconscious
Wyvern heals everyone
We fight the Tekina of Yuki-onna, trying to flee from battle...
Rui‚õÑ seems to have a connection to the Yuki-onna, wanting us to stop fighting but we don't
We kill the Tekina of the Yuki-onna, Rui‚õÑ's head getting grabbed beforehand and information being transferred... She screams, recoiling in pain
Macko is here, aka Wyvern... He defends us against the other two bearers Greenish orange dragon saves us from reinforcements...
A man on all fours walks out... Paragus Kou also joins us...
Throws a crystal like Heraüëø had and a portal opens up We arrive at a place that a lot of people have gathered, lot of bearers
Yari is here, half of his face gnashed; he takes Rui‚õÑ's pain away with his lineage's ability
We are between Ikcho, Yatari, and Samni, a small area below the border
Paragus Kou meets with the party...
Wahlenüí´ tells him about the dream
Ceolüî• recounts that 2 icons of the same element is unheard of, he fought in a war with (2) Campaign/1-Entities/Ulone
Ganra Dokugan is mentioned, maybe they are working with them, the Tekina of the Kagenami
[Hera]] asks about Paragus Kou...
Paragus Kou is a fugitive from Yatari, Samni, and Ikcho and the Kagenami
He wants to understand the Veylfloods and get peace to Bearers
He walked into a Veylflood and was unharmed... due to a Helix Dragon... he is the spring dragon...
Rui‚õÑ's turn...
His son became a Veyllost
Shiori‚≠ê of the shadowstriders "Don't trust... It eats gods"
Akenai does not officialy exist, but the ruler of what Yatari is now, Timbatzu Azuna the ruler, were affiliated... After investigating, Paragus Kou is no longer allowed in Yatari. They were doing something with the Taor ruins
2nd Aikon of fire right outside of a Taor ruin
Iron works is making crystals made out of Taor ruins
Aikon of fire fighting a red-aired man made of steel, land splits in half, Timbatzu Azuna WASN'T ALWAYS A Tekina, they sacrificed many Oni

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-10.htm.title: Session 10
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-10.htm.description:
We are going north towards a town, Lostwing Traversing through an overgrown forest
Wahlenüí´ gathers some plant poison that was spit at Heraüëø
After the party kills human-sized red beetles, Rui‚õÑ grabs some of their shells We find a carriage 210 cp, 90 sp, 40 gp 3 common healing potions
We fight the Guardian... The group wounds it, the wounds are covered in pipes and tubes that magically reconnect (even with distance). It's only a matter of time before it comes back
Wahlenüí´ feeds it blood, and it reanimates... oops See a man in whiteish black armor running past...
He's an honor guard from Yatari, we follow him
Heraüëø recognizes Kazera, the Tekina of the Wind
A man is pleading for his life, he brought someone to Lostwing... They are looking for a Tekina
The captain we fought is a blessed of Tengu
Where Macko is the blessed of Ryu

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-11.htm.title: Session 11
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-11.htm.description:
We arrive at Lostwing, a Taor ruin of a wing... The village is made around it... It should be bright like a candle, there is no light or people
THEY TOOK other bearers to the Shiro Akuagan
Looking for a Tekina that is no longer here
5 bearers imprisoned, one of which are Enokaga
We meet Kazera after the battle, where she summons something to fight us...
She offers us a job with Yatari, if we worked for them, we'd work for Timbatzu Azuna
Hikari Seiji attacked Yatari
Paragus Kou and Kazera know each other
She used to be a very faithful woman, that's why Paragus Kou married her He betrayed his country, a lord commander?
The emperor, Timbatzu Azuna whispered to people that he didn't think Levin was a god Poisoned battalions that he was in command of
They found the Tekina, they vanish We rest after the fight, going to the fort tomorrow...
Red cloak person was asking for the Tekina of Fire We approach the fort... Go in through a sewer
Yatari will be using the Tekina of fire...
We fight Kazera...
The flames that consumed Ryu are not holy by nature
Heraüëø is hiding something "There you are" Reading letter
"Lord Takuta, as my advisor retires if you are my next top candidate... You will be the youngest inducted, Wahlen Takuta, Sigillite of Teradaüí´, pure silver hair that goes to shoulders,Reading letter of friend?
Lord Sachio, tactical wit did bring doubt, but without it... it was highly unlikely that we would live. Warmaster Oharah Sachio
"I'm waiting Wahlenüí´"

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-12.htm.title: Session 12
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-12.htm.description:
We are on our back way to the Hideaway...
Paragus sends a message
Ceolüî• hears a soft crunching of bones, looking up at ~20 Shokari Your need help? Ride. Trade. Meat. Small. From bodies. For the hunt.
Upon eating Wahlenüí´... "Old. Older than Shokari." We get on their horses with ape hands and horns and ride
Praxisüòº gets a note from Paragus: "I have found something I can't explain. Please come help." Praxisüòº makes his way there....
Wahlenüí´ is in a makeshift dungeon dreaming... In the shower, water cold. Speaker translates as words come through announcing my arrival. "Fire fox, fire fox"... meaning you are needed in the cockpit
In the cockpit there is crystals with projections of status. Terrada is on the helm, high alert with fox-like features; Oharah is holding their blade tapping their foot. Projection in front of Terrada, 6 crystals with names of the Akions. Tengu and Ryu are down.
Blob of flesh, metal, and stone... 2 crystals on it: Yamakaen, Okami
Tsuchigomo has been eliminated, Yuki-onna has been eliminated... cooling systems offline... all Akions go offline... Okami online We get to the escape pods, jet out, ship destroyed, among the stars
Dream cuts to current Ulone (Land), hard to breathe, massive blade in kidney, poison going through body, Akenai is trying to heal Wahlenüí´. Oharah runs towards Wahlenüí´, stabbing a shard into his heart... Oharah does an operation, dropping part of Wahlenüí´'s heart on the ground. Oharah grabs the half of heart and the memory ends
Wahlenüí´ and Heraüëø switch dreams...
Wahlenüí´ is no longer in their body... in Heraüëø's body, she's training with her father. This is a nice memory of Heraüëø's training... Memory cuts to her and Serai studying with a book open on the desk, mouth agape... This is a big betrayal. Serai says nothing to deny it. Heraüëø grabs her blade and runs out of the estate.
As Heraüëø dreams weird dreams before her dreams are interrupted, her mind reeling. She is in the Suteki. Terrada is in front her her, long 9 tails, 2 large fox ears, looking aside and seeing a split rift of reality. Ulone is standing next to him, a root of Levin in his hand. Everyone is frozen in place, terrified. Terrada is looking Ulone down. "Run. Both of you. Run. Run as fast as you can." Ulone lunges at Wahlenüí´ before Terrada intercepts. A MASSIVE battle erupts. It sounds like Terrada is losing.
Heraüëø wakes up screaming before she stops.. She's not breathing. She's dying.
At the Hideaway...
Ceolüî• repairs armor and weapons, removing the sigil of Samni on Macko's armor
Rui‚õÑ gets pulled aside by Yari
You do know you're traveling with... motions to Heraüëø
Heraüëø's family is a HUGE deal
Praxisüòº gets ambushed by a tripwire, getting captured by the Hikari Seiji...
Two cloaked figures save him, the two Samurai captors running away One is abhuman (silver hair, horns) and one sets some captors on fire (black hair) "You will release him... or you will die."
Macko and Wahlenüí´ have a heated aside...
Praxisüòº slides into the group...
Mad at Paragus
Being chased by Hikari Seiji, we have to fight!
Tsuga Kitakuri has a message for Heraüëø
They would like to apologize for the events leading up to Imugi Arcaneworks, it should not have happened
Heraüëø's father wishes for her to return to the capital of Ikcho, this is not a demand but a request. "Repair things between each other" Heraüëø laughs and declines.
There is a high chance that Tsuga Kitakuri is sent to hunt Heraüëø down if she does not come. Next time he will be aiming to kill her
Enokaga recaps...
There is another Tekina of Fire ? Maybe Akaza is alive?
We need to intercept people at Ninnan Gate
We arrive at a town named Bulga, Samnii...
Someone is looking for Rui‚õÑ and sees the rest of us...Hinatsuru Shuki invites us to their home
There is some blue flashes of light happening at Ninnan Gate, a blue like the Guardian left Those who pray every day... the emperor says they should die
2nd Aikon of fire will emerge from the Taor ruins at Ninnan Gate to fight Ryu?

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-13.htm.title: Session 13
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-13.htm.description:
Ship Announcment Threat level minorous! Inside the Taor ruin at Ninnan Gate... 3 figures of the same height, another facing the group threateningly, one holds a sword Another image of one on the ground, and one stabbing a sword through them
Looking up there are stars blinking... blinking in time with Wahlenüí´'s heart beat... roots that are out of place coming down from the sides of the wall... roots of Levin
Pedestal of 8 crystals on the ground with the Aikons.. A voice says "assistance required" 1 Tengu
2 Ryu
3 Orochi
4 Namazu
5 Yuki-onna
6 Komyoryu
7 Amanozako
8 Tsuchigomo
Rui‚õÑ touches a beetle and sees a 3rd person POV of a large battlefield... 100s of bodies littered Sees 3 people with long silver hair, part dwarf, feline traits
One of those people is Oharah, kneeling and trying to stay awake
Oharah is the one that was attacked, and lost
Wahlenüí´ tries to save Oharah and gets stabbed by the poison dagger from his dreams
One of the felines screams and tries to help Wahlenüí´... Akenai
Oharah consumes the souls of the dead... "Get out of my realm" We all get onto a platform that the crystals unlocked... it starts to descend... "Threat level reassessed... majoris"
Symbol of Tengu, requires wind to open Combat! Big laser guy
Symbol of Yuki-onna... not feline, but human-ish with horns
Threat level extremeus... Deploying Tsuchiga
Rui‚õÑ sees a mural... Black figure with 8 wings, each wing looks different. The figure has a light behind it, almost divine
Wahlenüí´ Black tufts of hair beneath the cloak, who are you, you, we...
Starts screaming, fights himself, accepts that he is the 2nd icon of fire... Yamakaen... the one who killed Akaza Group has a heart to heart Found a combination lock on the floor, similar to the one. when when we got imprisoned

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-14.htm.title: Session 14
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-14.htm.description:
We go towards a town of Bulga... EXPLOSION in the distance in the town
The people we see in the town are the Hikari Seiji, the current people in charge in Samni. They look around, a large person holding a barrel commanding "Kill them!"
3 people left, one of whom is Hinatsuru Shuki
There is a letter attached to a Shard... Seems like you've got yourself a new friend! No worries, there's plenty of your gift to go around, if you have the will for it at least. After all, the zealots just needed a little push to come here. Consider this one on the house. Hope to work together again soon.
Heraüëø gives the shard to Wahlenüí´ and after a long drawn out process, Wahlenüí´ tells the group some answers
The Shard goes into book and helps Praxisüòº
Rui‚õÑ and Ceolüî• sleep separately, Rui‚õÑ goes to the Suteki with Terrada. Terrada did not want us to keep exploring the Taor ruins
Ganra has a disagreement with the Kagenami. Ganra went north with a section of the Kagenami, the split faction in the Kagenami went south
We plan with Paragus to attack the capital of Ikcho
Yari will not come with us but Macko will

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-15.htm.title: Session 15
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-15.htm.description:
About 3 months ago Standing on the exact bridge in current time is the Tekina of Tsuchigomo, slamming a fist into the wall as the bridge shakes
A servant cowers, presenting Ganra a box... "Tell me who sent it, or you will get the same fate"... Apparently Ceolüî• sent it. "I let you run among with the rest of your rats and this is how I am repaid?! I will tear him apart. LEAVE. Or I will see you are crushed."
Ganra screams out in fury, slowly falling to his knees as he holds the side of the box. The box contains the remains of Kazera.
Tsuga Kitakuri stands in front of us, a blade of glass stabbed into the ground. Ornately dressed in non-metal armor with 3 pistols on his hip... "I know why you are here..."
"I'll turn 29 this fall. I'm a young man, second youngest to ever become a Samurai. I have a lot to learn. I have not seen the Great War, been a servant under Timbatzu Azuna, and I have not been the Second Aikon of Fire. But I have never been a stupid man. So I question why you are here. Why you exist. Your kind aren't meant to be here. Perhaps your father hid you. But there is no chance that the Gintsuii don't know. You must be some sort of experiment. And I'm here to kill you. I don't know why you exist, but I don't need to. Behind this door is a truth that will shatter our world. A truth that we don't need. Please, I am giving you all a chance. Turn around. We can forget this happened. Lay low. Let the war pass. Live in peace. You'll hurt so many people if you uncover this truth. Please. Turn around."
The Samurai have probably known this for 20 years, maybe more. We make our way down, it seems to be completely cleared out.
Tsuga Kitakuri is waiting for Heraüëø... He wields a giant blade: "That's far enough."
We see the resolve of a Samurai, the face of someone that knows they now have to try... A face that Heraüëø has not seen from her father.
"I am Tsuga Kitakuri, beast of Ikcho. Fall before the war god, fall before a beast!"
Tsuga Kitakuri draws his large Odachi... We almost all die...
Heraüëø stands up, blocking armageddon with black leaves and branches "8th leaf is faith, 9th is good luck... and the tenth... leaf feeds off of resolve... SHE'S A DEVIL"
There's usually between 6-7 leaves on Levin The door tries to stop us... "Danger. Cannot stop you. Turn back. Death" We go further in... We see a chair in the middle of a room, a giant crystal floating in the air. Someone is floating to the side with long white hair
This is Ikcho, he disappeared 200 years ago. The person in the chair is 4 feet tall max... A dwarf? But the skin is so clung to their body, their skin clings to the ribs as if it's holding them together. This person hasn't eaten in a long time. They are dead, or at least appear to be Then we see the lungs expand and slowly go back down.... On top of this figure's head is a crest of red hair.
"My father. Hermit. Betrayer. Yori. Yori. Yori. Ceolüî•. Ceolüî•. Ceolüî•."
It is Ceolüî•'s son, Yori... But... he saw him die? Not a son. A Name. A number. A tool a product. A father. Not a father. Thing. Thing. Thing.. Apotheosis. Fate. Fate. Fate. Renewal. Past. Despair. Decay.
Ceolüî• goes in to touch him... "THREAT LEVEL PRIMUS. THREAT." "Powering up. 20%. 40%. Influx. Influx. Influx."
Ikcho's eyes go dark and looks at Wahlenüí´
Wahlenüí´ feels a stab wound in his side, as in his memories. "Creature. Darkness of the night."
Ikcho's eyes start glowing, Yori is yanked upwards and constructs start to form in front of us. They are made of silver and gold energy.
Macko rears back, firing water and constricting the prim guardian...
Ikcho sees this: "Brother?"
Ceolüî• my father. My Family. Yori the last tool. The last object. Father. "I know not what you are. Hear me. Free me. I will take his place. Porcelain figure of pure white light, face contours look humanoid, but it looks a little too perfect. What should be eyes are deep black spheres. It moves its hands up, splitting into 5 pieces. "Now, you will become one. One last time" Ceol smashes it, stopping it. Ikcho has been repelled. This treachery will not last.
Serai comes to save us. Akaza comes in, cloaked. I know you're there Velorah.
"Oh. you learned our name. What else have you learned. Ryu"
You seek the power of Arutsua, the power of the forgotten twins. If you want them, come through me.
A dome of fire from Akaza encapsulates Velorah. I am ryu, I am the flames of destruction. The flames of life! Velorah enters Akaza's chest, fire leaving and him vomiting blood.

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-16.htm.title: Session 16
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-16.htm.description:
Wahlenüí´ is passed out
Grayscale, on a beach, giving 2 crystals to Oharah. A small cat-like girl, very young (5 max), that's Akenai... A same age man, probably red-ish hair (deep crimson, not like Ceolüî•). Oharah puts a crystal in his pocket, the other one he holds... A wolf symbol with 9 tails on it.... "I am not sure what to do with this one...".... Cut to Oharah and Akenai hovering over me. Oharah is holding half of Wahlenüí´'s heart over him.... A silver haired man on the floor, head ripped off and dead. 2 women by the side, one badly wounded, one missing an arm, both having long silver hair. Terrada quickly rushes over and everyone speaks to each other. "What did you do Oharah?!" I SAVED HIM?! YOU DAMNED HIM !! HE'S ALIVE AND WELL YOU'RE TURNING HIM INTO THE ANATHEMA. MOVE
Terrada commands him to move, commanding authority over Oharah
Terrada sprinkles the dust of Wahlenüí´'s heart into his book
"Yakumo... Kill her"... Red haired man grabs Ikcho's arm and kills them. Hair turns to steel, and attacks Yatari."
The Hideaway is under attack. We teleport in, the sky lights up in fire, Ikcho is attacking the Hideaway
Likely Ganra's forces
Tsuchigomo
The top of Mount Tsuchigomo is exposed as a result of Ganra's attack, exposing a Taor ruin

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-17.htm.title: Session 17
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-17.htm.description:
We holed up in a cave, after the events of the Hideaway We hunted some animals for food
Wahlenüí´ failed a wisdom save and ate a goose head; was alone when this happened Role play!
Rui‚õÑ, Wahlenüí´, Macko, and Yari were all hashing their emotions
There's a crystal in Wahlenüí´'s book, giving it to Seungüëä Power up!
We set out towards Taichun

(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-18.htm.title: Session 18
(3)-sessions/(1)-season-1/session-18.htm.description:
On our way towards Taichun, 2 day travel Some feat train time!
We go over Paragus's notes, a lot of it is word vomiting thoughts...
Suspects Arcaneworks is taking magic from the land
How to reverse Veil Lost; getting resistance to the Veil. Strong mages or Tekina are resistant to the Veil. If we take samples from them, they could be made into something that helps reverse it. Blood doesn't work, skin samples don't work
What did work was skin grafting, as the body of the Veil Lost heals very rapidly. If something is put in the way, something can absorb it.
Wahlenüí´ makes a check: No Yokai has ever become Veil Lost. They are likely immune or resistant to a high degree
We arrive in Taichun People are walking around, shopping, and living life despite the war going on around them
Macko's uncle is probably in one of the Shikis.
Macko, Rui‚õÑ, and Heraüëø go to see Macko's uncle They see a lot of dead monsters as trophies hung on the wall
A man with a cane walks in, similar to Akibara. The cane has a firearm hammer on it, and in the other hand a large axe "My nephew is dead, and you come in here impersonating him..."
Macko hands him the latter written by Hinatsuru Shuki
I am Natsu Shuki, this is my blade Earthbreaker!
(Macko and Rui‚õÑ have an aside: "If things go wrong.... I think you could take him out")
Macko catches Natsu Shuki up; he seems disappointed he wasn't there
Natsu Shuki can't keep the bearers from the Hideaway for long, as he would require legal permits and people would question it. The Arcanum would start to crack down. There are options...
Stay here in Samni, probably being drafted to fight to Yatari Get killed here
Going to Ikcho where they will likely be put into the Arcaneworks and die shortly
Climbing the Whistling Mountains, likely dying
Going to Land of Leaves, likely dying
"Do you intend to carry out the same mission of Paragus?"
There is a place a few dozen miles from there that we could take refuge in... It's in the middle of a lake, a ruin of Taor that has been long inactive. It was likely some sort of flotation vessel. It provides a good foundation for a base.... The only problem Natsu Shuki sees with it is that some parts of the land has been drained of life; the water here is tainted. He will help us set it up, and in exchange...
Someone from the Arcanum keeps trying to buy a magical item from him. It's not really an unusual or rare item, but they are very adamant about buying it. The person goes by the name of Lord Ando (likely a false name), and they send various messengers. Natsu Shuki wants an escort into the Arcanum, as he is not welcomed there. He found the object, a small pendant with no chain with a reddish green gem, in Yatari.
Paragus Kou

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the more connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make disconnected parts more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.
